alertName.value: Kubevirt VM network transmit drop high

query.value: InsightsMetrics | invoke pquery_counter('kubevirt_vmi_network_transmit_packets_dropped_total') | extend vmiName = tostring(Labels.name) | extend vmiNamespace = tostring(Labels.namespace) | extend vmiNode = tostring(Labels.node) | extend interface = tostring(Labels.interface) | where interface !in ('lo') | summarize DropRate = sum(DeltaVal) / sum(DeltaTimeSeconds) by Computer, Origin, AgentId, SourceSystem, Type, _ResourceId, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode, interface
